job.title: Controls Project Engineer
job.description: If you are a Controls Project Engineer with experience, please read on!  We are a company with an expertise in custom product specific tooling, machine design and manufacturing. We pride ourselves on having a creative team that can take on any challenge. We have a world class design and engineering department that is here to take care of our customers in any way that they need. If you are looking to join a highly skilled team that has been around for over 45 years you have come to the right place!  What You Will Be Doing  You will start a project at the beginning and follow it through to our customer installation acceptance. You will review customer specifications, standards, their past projects, and work with our team of hardware engineers to complete the controls portions of the machine. You will work with the software engineers to develop software using the same criteria. You will be responsible for producing a quality design on schedule, getting customer acceptance, reviewing panel build and assisting as required while the machine is being built. Travel is possible for customer meetings, field checks or installation support.  What You Need for this Position What's In It for You So, if you are a Controls Project Engineer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Zack.Waltz@CyberCoders.com Zack Waltz - Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
